summary: The story of the first blind man ever to reach the top of Mount Everest.
cast: Peter Facinelli|Jack Knight|Dawson Dunbar|Sarah Manninen|Bruce Campbell|Kate Greenhouse|Robert Moloney|Saxon DeCocq|Aaron Poole|Shaun Johnston|Mingma Sherpa|Marty Antonini|Kurtis Sanheim|Sean Anthony Olsen|Joseph Allan Sutherland|Joel Smith|Steve Smith|Jonathan Love|Brooklynn Proulx|Taheer Nurani|Sarah Hyslop|Connor Robinson|Connor Schmidt|Talon Dunbar|Lori Ravensborg|Ron Carothers|James Dugan|Gillian Carfra|Gerald Matthews|David LeReaney|Tommy Lim|Cassandra Bennett|Chris Ippolito|Tarra Riley|Aedan Tomney|Stephen Strachan|Kate Newby|Wally Houn|Carrie Colak|Larry Austin|Lindsay Burns|Khari Jones|Brian Copping|Tom Carey|Sheldon Bergstrom|Jenna Rene|Sara Fowlow|Michael Heltay|Marnie Madden|Charlie Robson
title: Touch the Top of the World
